requires:         - block header should match with source blockhash         - metachain id should not be 0         - a core for the specified metachain id should exist         - precommit for the corresponding core should exist         - committee should have been formed for the precommit         - committee decision should match with the specified           committee lock         - committee decision should match with the core's precommit         - the given metablock parameters should match with the           core's precommit.         - anchor contract for the given metachain id should exist","params":{"_accumulatedGas":"The total consumed gas on auxiliary within this                       meta-block.","_committeeLock":"The committee lock that hashes the transaction                      root on the auxiliary chain.","_dynasty":"The dynasty number where the meta-block closes                on the auxiliary chain.","_kernelHash":"Kernel hash","_metachainId":"Metachain id.","_originObservation":"Observation of the origin chain.","_rlpBlockHeader":"RLP encoded block header.","_source":"Source block hash.","_sourceBlockHeight":"Source block height.","_target":"Target block hash.","_targetBlockHeight":"Target block height."}},"enterCommittee(bytes32,address,address,address)":{"details":"Function requires:         - the given metachain id is not 0         - the given core's address is not 0         - the given validator's address is not 0         - the given 'further' validator's address is not 0         - the given core is running         - valid validator is given             - is active in the given core             - has not been slashed         - the corresponding metablock's round is 'CommitteeFormed'","params":{"_furtherMember":"Validator address that is further member                      compared to the `_validator` address","_metachainId":"Metachain id for the committee to enter.","_validator":"Validator address to enter."}},"formCommittee(bytes32)":{"details":"Function requires:         - the given metachain id is not 0         - assigned core has precommitted a metablock         - committee formation height passed         - committee formation blocksegment must be in the most           recent 256 blocks."},"getAnchor(bytes32)":{"params":{"_metachainId":"Metachain Id"},"return":"anchor_ Anchor address."},"hashMetachainId(address)":{"params":{"_anchor":"Anchor address of the new metachain."},"return":"metachainId_ Metachain id."},"join(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Function requires:         - Core should exist for given metachain         - core lifetime status must be genesis or active","params":{"_metachainId":"Metachain id that validator wants to join.","_withdrawalAddress":"A withdrawal address of newly joined validator."}},"joinDuringCreation(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Function requires:         - core should exist for given metachain         - core life time should be in creation state","params":{"_metachainId":"Metachain id that validator wants to join.","_withdrawalAddress":"A withdrawal address of newly joined validator."}},"logout(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Function requires:         - metachain id should not be 0.         - core address should not be 0.         - core should be assigned for the specified metachain id.         - core for the specified metachain id should exist.","params":{"_core":"Core address that validator wants to logout.","_metachainId":"Metachain id that validator wants to logout."}},"newMetachain()":{"details":"Function requires:         - msg.sender should be axiom contract.         - core is not assigned to metachain.","return":"metachainId_ Metachain id.anchor_ Address of anchor.mosaicVersion_ Mosaic Version.consensusGateway_ Address of Consensus Gateway."},"precommitMetablock(bytes32,uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"Function requires:         - the given metachain id is not 0         - the given metablock's hash is not 0         - the given metablock's height is +1 of the current           height of the metablockchain         - the caller is the assigned core of the metablockchain         - the caller (core) is running         - the current (tip) metablock of the metablockchain is committed"},"publishEndpoint(bytes32,string,string)":{"details":"Function requires:         - only validator can call.         - validator is not slashed.         - metachain id should be valid.","params":{"_endpoint":"Url for the service.","_metachainId":"Metachain id.","_service":"Service can be ipfs, enode, etc."}},"registerCommitteeDecision(bytes32,bytes32)":{"params":{"_committeeDecision":"Decision of a caller committee."}},"setup(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Function requires:         - Consensus contract should not be already setup.         - Committee size should be greater than 0.         - Minimum validator size must be greater or equal to 5.         - Maximum validator size should be greater or equal to minimum           validator size.         - Gas target delta should be greater than 0.         - Coin base split per mille should be in range: 0..1000.         - Reputation contract address should be 0.","params":{"_coinbaseSplitPerMille":"Coinbase split per mille.","_committeeSize":"Max committee size that can be formed.","_gasTargetDelta":"Gas target delta to open new metablock.","_joinLimit":"Maximum number of validators that can join a core.","_minValidators":"Minimum number of validators that must join a                      created core to open.","_reputation":"Reputation contract address."}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"commitMetablock(bytes32,bytes,bytes32,bytes32,uint256,uint256,bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Commits a metablock."},"coreValidatorThresholds()":{"notice":"Get minimum validator and join limit count. "},"enterCommittee(bytes32,address,address,address)":{"notice":"Enters a validator into a committee."},"formCommittee(bytes32)":{"notice":"Forms a new committee to verify the precommit."},"getAnchor(bytes32)":{"notice":"Get anchor address for metachain id."},"hashMetachainId(address)":{"notice":"Gets metachain id.        Metachain id format :        `0x19 0x4d <mosaic-domain-separator> <metachainid-typehash>` where        0x19 signed data as per EIP-191.        0x4d is version byte for Mosaic.        <mosaic-domain-separator> format is `MosaicDomain(string name,                           string version,uint256 originChainId,                           address consensus)`.        <metachainid-typehash> format is MetachainId(address anchor).     *         <mosaic-domain-separator> and <metachainid-typehash> is EIP-712        complaint."},"join(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Validator joins the core, when core lifetime status is genesis        or active. This is called by validator address."},"joinDuringCreation(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Validator joins the core, when core lifetime status is creation. nodes.documentation:
@notice Precommits a metablock.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - the given metachain id is not 0
         - the given metablock's hash is not 0
         - the given metablock's height is +1 of the current
           height of the metablockchain
         - the caller is the assigned core of the metablockchain
         - the caller (core) is running
         - the current (tip) metablock of the metablockchain is committed
nodes.name: precommitMetablock

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(bytes32 => mapping(uint256 => struct Consensus.Metablock storage ref))

nodes.documentation:
@notice Forms a new committee to verify the precommit.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - the given metachain id is not 0
         - assigned core has precommitted a metablock
         - committee formation height passed
         - committee formation blocksegment must be in the most
           recent 256 blocks.
nodes.name: formCommittee

nodes.documentation:
@notice Enters a validator into a committee.
     * @dev Function requires:
         - the given metachain id is not 0
         - the given core's address is not 0
         - the given validator's address is not 0
         - the given 'further' validator's address is not 0
         - the given core is running
         - valid validator is given
             - is active in the given core
             - has not been slashed
         - the corresponding metablock's round is 'CommitteeFormed'
     * @param _metachainId Metachain id for the committee to enter.
@param _validator Validator address to enter.
@param _furtherMember Validator address that is further member
                      compared to the `_validator` address
nodes.name: enterCommittee

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets metachain id.
        Metachain id format :
        `0x19 0x4d <mosaic-domain-separator> <metachainid-typehash>` where
        0x19 signed data as per EIP-191.
        0x4d is version byte for Mosaic.
        <mosaic-domain-separator> format is `MosaicDomain(string name,
                           string version,uint256 originChainId,
                           address consensus)`.
        <metachainid-typehash> format is MetachainId(address anchor).
     *         <mosaic-domain-separator> and <metachainid-typehash> is EIP-712
        complaint.
@param _anchor Anchor address of the new metachain.
     * @return metachainId_ Metachain id.
nodes.name: hashMetachainId

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets metachain id.
        Metachain id format :
        `0x19 0x4d <mosaic-domain-separator> <metachainid-typehash>` where
        0x19 signed data as per EIP-191.
        0x4d is version byte for Mosaic.
        <mosaic-domain-separator> format is `MosaicDomain(string name,
                           string version,uint256 originChainId,
                           address consensus)`.
        <metachainid-typehash> format is MetachainId(address anchor).
     *         <mosaic-domain-separator> and <metachainid-typehash> is EIP-712
        complaint.
@param _anchor Anchor address of the new metachain.
     * @return metachainId_ Metachain id.

nodes.name: hashBlockSegment

commitMetablock(bytes32,bytes,bytes32,by.details: Function requires:         - block header should match with source blockhash         - metachain id should not be 0         - a core for the specified metachain id should exist         - precommit for the corresponding core should exist         - committee should have been formed for the precommit         - committee decision should match with the specified           committee lock         - committee decision should match with the core's precommit         - the given metablock parameters should match with the           core's precommit.         - anchor contract for the given metachain id should exist

params._accumulatedGas: The total consumed gas on auxiliary within this                       meta-block.
params._committeeLock: The committee lock that hashes the transaction                      root on the auxiliary chain.
params._dynasty: The dynasty number where the meta-block closes                on the auxiliary chain.

enterCommittee(bytes32,address,address,a.details: Function requires:         - the given metachain id is not 0         - the given core's address is not 0         - the given validator's address is not 0         - the given 'further' validator's address is not 0         - the given core is running         - valid validator is given             - is active in the given core             - has not been slashed         - the corresponding metablock's round is 'CommitteeFormed'

params._furtherMember: Validator address that is further member                      compared to the `_validator` address
params._metachainId: Metachain id for the committee to enter.

formCommittee(bytes32).details: Function requires:         - the given metachain id is not 0         - assigned core has precommitted a metablock         - committee formation height passed         - committee formation blocksegment must be in the most           recent 256 blocks.

params._anchor: Anchor address of the new metachain.

join(bytes32,address).details: Function requires:         - Core should exist for given metachain         - core lifetime status must be genesis or active

params._metachainId: Metachain id that validator wants to join.
params._withdrawalAddress: A withdrawal address of newly joined validator.

joinDuringCreation(bytes32,address).details: Function requires:         - core should exist for given metachain         - core life time should be in creation state

params._metachainId: Metachain id that validator wants to join.
params._withdrawalAddress: A withdrawal address of newly joined validator.

logout(bytes32,address).details: Function requires:         - metachain id should not be 0.         - core address should not be 0.         - core should be assigned for the specified metachain id.         - core for the specified metachain id should exist.

params._core: Core address that validator wants to logout.
params._metachainId: Metachain id that validator wants to logout.

newMetachain().details: Function requires:         - msg.sender should be axiom contract.         - core is not assigned to metachain.
newMetachain().return: metachainId_ Metachain id.anchor_ Address of anchor.mosaicVersion_ Mosaic Version.consensusGateway_ Address of Consensus Gateway.

precommitMetablock(bytes32,uint256,bytes.details: Function requires:         - the given metachain id is not 0         - the given metablock's hash is not 0         - the given metablock's height is +1 of the current           height of the metablockchain         - the caller is the assigned core of the metablockchain         - the caller (core) is running         - the current (tip) metablock of the metablockchain is committed

publishEndpoint(bytes32,string,string).details: Function requires:         - only validator can call.         - validator is not slashed.         - metachain id should be valid.

params._service: Service can be ipfs, enode, etc.

setup(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Function requires:         - Consensus contract should not be already setup.         - Committee size should be greater than 0.         - Minimum validator size must be greater or equal to 5.         - Maximum validator size should be greater or equal to minimum           validator size.         - Gas target delta should be greater than 0.         - Coin base split per mille should be in range: 0..1000.         - Reputation contract address should be 0.

params._committeeSize: Max committee size that can be formed.
params._gasTargetDelta: Gas target delta to open new metablock.
params._joinLimit: Maximum number of validators that can join a core.
params._minValidators: Minimum number of validators that must join a                      created core to open.

coreValidatorThresholds().notice: Get minimum validator and join limit count.

enterCommittee(bytes32,address,address,a.notice: Enters a validator into a committee.

formCommittee(bytes32).notice: Forms a new committee to verify the precommit.

getAnchor(bytes32).notice: Get anchor address for metachain id.

hashMetachainId(address).notice: Gets metachain id.        Metachain id format :        `0x19 0x4d <mosaic-domain-separator> <metachainid-typehash>` where        0x19 signed data as per EIP-191.        0x4d is version byte for Mosaic.        <mosaic-domain-separator> format is `MosaicDomain(string name,                           string version,uint256 originChainId,                           address consensus)`.        <metachainid-typehash> format is MetachainId(address anchor).     *         <mosaic-domain-separator> and <metachainid-typehash> is EIP-712        complaint.

join(bytes32,address).notice: Validator joins the core, when core lifetime status is genesis        or active. This is called by validator address.

joinDuringCreation(bytes32,address).notice: Validator joins the core, when core lifetime status is creation.        This is called by validator address.

logout(bytes32,address).notice: Validator logs out. This is called by validator address.

newMetachain().notice: Creates a new meta chain.        This can be called only by axiom.

setup(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Setup consensus contract. Setup method can be called only once.
